mainBoard.flavorText: "Angels and inquisitors terrorize villages, but no one seems to notice the stirring out at sea."

foreignData.flavorText: „Engel und Inquisitoren terrorisieren die Dörfer, doch niemand scheint der turbulenten See seine Aufmerksamkeit zu schenken."
foreignData.name: Unterwassergrab-Erforscher
foreignData.text: Wenn die Unterwassergrab-Erforscher ins Spiel kommen, stelle Nachforschungen an. (Erzeuge einen Hinweis-Spielstein. Er ist ein Artefakt mit „{2}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Ziehe eine Karte.")

foreignData.flavorText: "Ángeles e inquisidores aterrorizan las aldeas, pero nadie parece apreciar la agitación del mar".
foreignData.name: Exploradores del cementerio marino
foreignData.text: Cuando los Exploradores del cementerio marino entren al campo de batalla, investiga. (Crea una ficha de Pista. Es un artefacto con "{2}, sacrificar este artefacto: Roba una carta".)

foreignData.flavorText: « Les anges et les inquisiteurs terrorisent les villages, mais personne ne semble remarquer l'agitation de la mer. »
foreignData.name: Explorateurs du cimetière marin
foreignData.text: Quand les Explorateurs du cimetière marin arrivent sur le champ de bataille, enquêtez. (Créez un jeton Indice. C'est un artefact avec « {2}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Piochez une carte. »)

foreignData.flavorText: "Mentre angeli e inquisitori terrorizzano i villaggi, nessuno sembra notare le acque agitate del mare."
foreignData.name: Esploratori della Relittopoli
foreignData.text: Quando gli Esploratori della Relittopoli entrano nel campo di battaglia, indaga. (Crea una pedina Indizio. È un artefatto con "{2}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Pesca una carta".)

foreignData.flavorText: 「天使と審問官が村を恐怖に陥れているが、海での不穏には誰も気づいていないようだ。」
foreignData.name: 溺墓の探検者
foreignData.text: 溺墓の探検者が戦場に出たとき、調査を行う。（手掛かり・トークン１つを生成する。それは、「{2},このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：カード１枚を引く。」を持つアーティファクトである。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード

foreignData.flavorText: 「村庄被天使和审判官弄得人心惶惶，但似乎没有人注意到海中异动。」
foreignData.name: 沉船地探险家
foreignData.text: 当沉船地探险家进战场时，探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

mainBoard.name: Drownyard Explorers
mainBoard.originalText: When Drownyard Explorers enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

rulings.text: If you sacrifice a Clue for another card's cost or effect, such as that of Angelic Purge or Tamiyo's Journal, you can't also pay {2} and sacrifice it to draw a card.
The token is named Clue Token and has the artifact subtype Clue. Clue isn't a creature type.
The tokens are normal artifacts. For example, they can be sacrificed to cast Angelic Purge or targeted by Root Out.

mainBoard.text: When Drownyard Explorers enters, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Careful. Leave it running for too long and it'll turn the whole building into angels."
—Tawnos

foreignData.flavorText:
„Vorsicht. Wenn man ihn zu lange machen lässt, verwandelt er das ganze Gebäude in Engel."
—Tawnos
foreignData.name: Pflichtbewusster Replikator
foreignData.text: Wenn der Pflichtbewusste Replikator ins Spiel kommt, kannst du {1} bezahlen. Wenn du dies tust, erzeuge einen Spielstein, der eine Kopie eines Spielsteins deiner Wahl ist, den du kontrollierst und dessen Name nicht Pflichtbewusster Replikator ist.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Ten cuidado. Si lo dejas demasiado tiempo encendido, convertirá todo el edificio en ángeles".
—Tawnos
foreignData.name: Duplicador diligente
foreignData.text: Cuando el Duplicador diligente entre al campo de batalla, puedes pagar {1}. Cuando lo hagas, crea una ficha que es una copia de la ficha objetivo que controlas que no se llame Duplicador diligente.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Attention. Si on le laisse en marche trop longtemps, il transformera tout le bâtiment en anges. »
—Tavnos
foreignData.name: Réplicateur consciencieux
foreignData.text: Quand le Réplicateur consciencieux arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez payer {1}. Quand vous faites ainsi, créez un jeton qui est une copie d'un jeton ciblé que vous contrôlez qui n'est pas appelé Réplicateur consciencieux.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Fai attenzione. Se lo lasci acceso per troppo tempo, trasformerà l'intero edificio in angeli."
—Tawnos
foreignData.name: Replicante Diligente
foreignData.text: Quando il Replicante Diligente entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi pagare {1}. Quando lo fai, crea una pedina che è una copia di una pedina bersaglio che controlli e che non si chiama Replicante Diligente.

foreignData.flavorText:
「お気を付けください。あまり長く作動させたまま放っておくと建物ごと天使に変えてしまいます。」
――タウノス
foreignData.name: 忠実な複製機
foreignData.text: 忠実な複製機が戦場に出たとき、あなたは{1}を支払ってもよい。そうしたとき、あなたがコントロールしていて「忠実な複製機」という名前でないトークン１つを対象とする。それのコピーであるトークン１つを生成する。
foreignData.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — 組立作業員

foreignData.flavorText:
「当心点。如果你放任它自行运作太久，它甚至会把整幢大楼都变成天使。」
～达硌士
foreignData.name: 尽责摹形械
foreignData.text: 当尽责摹形械进战场时，你可以支付{1}。当你如此作时，派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为目标由你操控且名称不为尽责摹形械之衍生物的复制品。

mainBoard.name: Dutiful Replicator
mainBoard.originalText: When Dutiful Replicator enters the battlefield, you may pay {1}. When you do, create a token that's a copy of target token you control not named Dutiful Replicator.
mainBoard.text: When Dutiful Replicator enters, you may pay {1}. When you do, create a token that's a copy of target token you control not named Dutiful Replicator.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"The perfect assistant is one that's responsive, dextrous, and capable of reaching all the high shelves."
—Coruk, Esper artificer

foreignData.flavorText:
„Der perfekte Helfer ist ein reaktionsschneller und geschickter Assistent, der in der Lage ist, alle hohen Regale zu erreichen."
—Coruk, Esper-Handwerker
foreignData.name: Diener des Filigranen
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Die Stärke des Dieners des Filigranen ist gleich der Anzahl an Artefakten, die du kontrollierst.

foreignData.flavorText:
"El ayudante ideal es el que está atento, es hábil y puede llegar a las estanterías altas".
—Córuk, artífice de Esper
foreignData.name: Ayudante de filigrana
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
La fuerza del Ayudante de filigrana es igual a la cantidad de artefactos que controlas.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Le parfait assistant doit être réactif, adroit et capable d'atteindre les étagères les plus hautes. »
—Coruk, artificier d'Esper
foreignData.name: Suivant de filigrane
foreignData.text:
Vol
La force du Suivant de filigrane est égale au nombre d'artefacts que vous contrôlez.

foreignData.flavorText:
"L'assistente perfetto deve essere reattivo, capace e in grado di raggiungere gli scaffali più alti."
—Coruk, artefice di Esper
foreignData.name: Servitore di Filigrana
foreignData.text:
Volare
La forza del Servitore di Filigrana è pari al numero di artefatti che controlli.

foreignData.flavorText:
「完璧な助手の条件は、責任感があり、器用で、高い棚にも手が届くことだ。」
――エスパーの工匠、コルーク
foreignData.name: 金線の従者
foreignData.text:
飛行
金線の従者のパワーは、あなたがコントロールしているアーティファクトの数に等しい。
foreignData.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — ホムンクルス

foreignData.flavorText:
「最完美的助理要反应快，手工巧，还能摸到架子最高处。」
～艾斯波神器师寇路
foreignData.name: 丝金随员
foreignData.text:
飞行
丝金随员的力量等同于由你操控之神器数量。

mainBoard.name: Filigree Attendant
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Filigree Attendant's power is equal to the number of artifacts you control.

rulings.text: The ability that defines Filigree Attendant's power works in all zones, not just the battlefield.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
Filigree Attendant's power is equal to the number of artifacts you control.

mainBoard.flavorText: The thief doubled back twice, doused herself with perfume, crossed the ocean, and still woke up with her pursuer close on her heels.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Diebin wechselte mehrmals die Richtung, übergoss sich mit Parfüm, überquerte den Ozean und erwachte dennoch mit ihrem Verfolger dicht auf ihren Fersen.
foreignData.name: Fluthund
foreignData.text: {3}, {T}: Stelle Nachforschungen an. (Erzeuge einen Hinweis-Spielstein. Er ist ein Artefakt mit „{2}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Ziehe eine Karte.")

foreignData.flavorText: La ladrona volvió sobre sus pasos dos veces, se impregnó de perfume, cruzó el océano... Pero su perseguidor aún le pisaba los talones.
foreignData.name: Hidrobueso
foreignData.text: {3}, {T}: Investiga. (Crea una ficha de Pista. Es un artefacto con "{2}, sacrificar este artefacto: Roba una carta".)

foreignData.flavorText: La voleuse fit demi-tour deux fois, s'aspergea de parfum, traversa l'océan et se réveilla quand même avec le pisteur à ses trousses.
foreignData.name: Flolimier
foreignData.text: {3}, {T} : Enquêtez. (Créez un jeton Indice. C'est un artefact avec « {2}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Piochez une carte. »)

foreignData.flavorText: La ladra tornò sui propri passi due volte, si innaffiò di profumo, attraversò l'oceano, ma al suo risveglio aveva ancora il suo inseguitore alle calcagna.
foreignData.name: Segugio della Marea
foreignData.text: {3}, {T}: Indaga. (Crea una pedina Indizio. È un artefatto con "{2}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Pesca una carta".)

foreignData.flavorText: 泥棒は二度折り返して逃げ切ろうとした。全身に香水を浴びて、海を横切って。それでも目を覚ますとすぐそばまで追っ手が来ていた。
foreignData.name: 氾濫犬
foreignData.text: {3},{T}：調査を行う。（手掛かり・トークン１つを生成する。それは、「{2},このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：カード１枚を引く。」を持つアーティファクトである。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — エレメンタル・犬

foreignData.flavorText: 小偷两度折返迂回，香水洒满身，还横渡海洋，但醒来时追踪者依然紧随她身后。
foreignData.name: 寻水猎犬
foreignData.text: {3}，{T}：探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

mainBoard.name: Floodhound
mainBoard.originalText: {3}, {T}: Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

rulings.text: The token is named Clue Token and has the artifact subtype Clue. Clue isn't a creature type.
You can't sacrifice a Clue to activate its own ability and also to activate another ability that requires sacrificing a Clue (or any artifact) as a cost, such as that of Lonis, Cryptozoologist.

mainBoard.text: {3}, {T}: Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

mainBoard.flavorText: Its collection is vast, yet each ship has a special place in its heart.

foreignData.flavorText: Ihre Sammlung ist riesig und doch hat jedes Schiff einen besonderen Platz in ihrem Herzen.
foreignData.name: Maschinen-Verschlingerin
foreignData.text:
Dieser Zauberspruch kostet beim Wirken für jedes Artefakt, das du kontrollierst, {1} weniger.
{5}{U}: Die Maschinen-Verschlingerin kann in diesem Zug nicht geblockt werden.

foreignData.flavorText: Su colección es inmensa, pero cada nave tiene un hueco especial en su corazón.
foreignData.name: Serpiente devoraingenios
foreignData.text:
Te cuesta {1} menos lanzar este hechizo por cada artefacto que controlas.
{5}{U}: La Serpiente devoraingenios no puede ser bloqueada este turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Sa collection est immense, mais chaque vaisseau a une place spéciale dans son cœur.
foreignData.name: Serpent mécanochercheur
foreignData.text:
Ce sort coûte {1} de moins à lancer pour chaque artefact que vous contrôlez.
{5}{U} : Le Serpent mécanochercheur ne peut pas être bloqué ce tour-ci.

foreignData.flavorText: La sua collezione è vasta, ma ogni navicella occupa un posto speciale nel suo cuore.
foreignData.name: Serpe Meccanivora
foreignData.text:
Questa magia costa {1} in meno per essere lanciata per ogni artefatto che controlli.
{5}{U}: La Serpe Meccanivora non può essere bloccata in questo turno.

foreignData.flavorText: それが有する船のコレクションは莫大だが、個々の船それぞれに思い入れがある。
foreignData.name: 歯車襲いの海蛇
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるためのコストは、あなたがコントロールしているアーティファクト１つにつき{1}少なくなる。
{5}{U}：このターン、歯車襲いの海蛇はブロックされない。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 海蛇

foreignData.flavorText: 它的收藏丰富，但每艘船在其心中都占有特殊地位。
foreignData.name: 觅械巨蛇
foreignData.text:
你每操控一个神器，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。
{5}{U}：觅械巨蛇本回合不能被阻挡。

mainBoard.name: Gearseeker Serpent
mainBoard.originalText:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.
{5}{U}: Gearseeker Serpent can't be blocked this turn.

rulings.text: Gearseeker Serpent's first ability can't reduce the total cost to cast the spell below {U}{U}.
Once Gearseeker Serpent has been blocked, activating its last ability won't cause it to become unblocked.
Once a player has announced that they are casting Gearseeker Serpent, no player may take actions to try to change the number of artifacts its controller controls before the spell's cost is locked in.

The total cost to cast Gearseeker Serpent is locked in before you pay that cost. For example, if you control three artifacts, including one you can sacrifice to add {C}, the total cost of Gearseeker Serpent is {2}{U}{U}. Then you can sacrifice the artifact when you activate mana abilities just before paying the cost.

mainBoard.text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.
{5}{U}: Gearseeker Serpent can't be blocked this turn.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"The young squire gripped her sword as the clanking stranger emerged. It was no knight that had come to challenge her."
—*Beyond the Great Henge*

foreignData.flavorText:
„Die junge Junkerin ergriff ihr Schwert, als der scheppernde Fremde auftauchte. Es war kein Ritter, der gekommen war, um sie herauszufordern."
—*Jenseits des Großen Steinkreises*
foreignData.name: Trottende Rüstung
foreignData.text: Die Stärke der Trottenden Rüstung ist gleich der Anzahl an Artefakten und/oder Verzauberungen, die du kontrollierst.

foreignData.flavorText:
"La joven escudera empuñó con fuerza su espada en cuanto apareció el extraño chirriante, pero quien había venido a desafiarla no era ningún caballero".
—*Más allá del Gran Crómlech*
foreignData.name: Armadura en pedazos
foreignData.text: La fuerza de la Armadura en pedazos es igual a la cantidad de artefactos y/o encantamientos que controlas.

foreignData.flavorText:
« La jeune écuyère agrippa son épée lorsque l'inconnu cliquetant émergea. Ce n'était pas un chevalier qui était venu la défier. »
—*Au-delà du Grand Cromlech*
foreignData.name: Armure titubante
foreignData.text: La force de l'Armure titubante est égale au nombre d'artefacts et/ou d'enchantements que vous contrôlez.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Quando apparve lo sconosciuto sferragliante, la giovane scudiera strinse la sua spada. Non era un cavaliere quello che era venuto a sfidarla."
—*Oltre il Grande Monolito*
foreignData.name: Armatura Barcollante
foreignData.text: La forza dell'Armatura Barcollante è pari al numero di artefatti e/o incantesimi che controlli.

foreignData.flavorText:
「金属の音を立てながら向かってくる者に、若い従者は剣を握りしめた。自分に向かってくる騎士など、これまでいなかった。」
――*グレートヘンジを超えて*
foreignData.name: よろめく鎧
foreignData.text: よろめく鎧のパワーは、あなたがコントロールしているアーティファクトやエンチャントの総数に等しい。
foreignData.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — 構築物

foreignData.flavorText:
「咔嚓作响的陌生人忽然出现，年轻的扈从握紧利剑。前来挑战她的根本就不是骑士。」
～*《圆石阵奇谭》*
foreignData.name: 跛行铠甲
foreignData.text: 跛行铠甲的力量等同于由你操控之神器和／或结界的总数量。

mainBoard.name: Shambling Suit
mainBoard.originalText: Shambling Suit's power is equal to the number of artifacts and/or enchantments you control.

rulings.text: A permanent that's both an artifact and an enchantment is only counted once.
As long as Shambling Suit is on the battlefield, its ability will count itself, so it'll be at least 1/3.
The ability that defines Shambling Suit's power works in all zones, not just the battlefield.

mainBoard.text: Shambling Suit's power is equal to the number of artifacts and/or enchantments you control.

mainBoard.flavorText: Art is unknown to the vedalken—for them, all creations must serve a purpose.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Vedalken kennen keine Kunst — für sie muss alles einen Zweck und Sinn haben.
foreignData.name: Vedalken-Ingenieur
foreignData.text: {T}: Erzeuge zwei Mana genau einer beliebigen Farbe. Gib dieses Mana nur aus, um Artefaktzauber zu wirken oder Fähigkeiten von Artefakten zu aktivieren.

foreignData.flavorText: Los vedalken no conocen el arte. Para ellos, todas las creaciones deben ser útiles.
foreignData.name: Ingeniero vedalken
foreignData.text: {T}: Agrega dos manás de un color cualquiera. Usa este maná solo para lanzar hechizos de artefacto o activar habilidades de artefactos.

foreignData.flavorText: L'art est un concept étranger aux vedalkens ; pour eux, toute création doit servir un but.
foreignData.name: Ingénieur vedalken
foreignData.text: {T} : Ajoutez deux manas d'une seule couleur de votre choix. Ne dépensez ce mana que pour lancer des sorts d'artefact ou activer des capacités d'artefact.

foreignData.flavorText: Il concetto di arte è ignoto ai vedalken: per loro ogni creazione deve avere uno scopo.
foreignData.name: Ingegnere Vedalken
foreignData.text: {T}: Aggiungi due mana di un qualsiasi colore. Spendi questo mana solo per lanciare magie artefatto o attivare abilità di artefatti.

foreignData.flavorText: ヴィダルケンは芸術を理解しない。彼らにとって、すべての物には目的が必要なのだ。
foreignData.name: ヴィダルケンの技術者
foreignData.text: {T}：好きな色１色のマナ２点を加える。このマナは、アーティファクト・呪文を唱えるためか、アーティファクトの能力を起動するためにしか支払えない。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ヴィダルケン・工匠

foreignData.flavorText: 维多肯族不懂艺术～对他们来说，万物均各有创造目的。
foreignData.name: 维多肯工程师
foreignData.text: {T}：加两点任意颜色的单色法术力。此法术力只能用来施放神器咒语，或是起动神器的异能。

mainBoard.name: Vedalken Engineer
mainBoard.originalText: {T}: Add two mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.
mainBoard.text: {T}: Add two mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.

foreignData.name: Auf Antworten drängen
foreignData.text:
Tappe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl. Sie enttappt nicht während des nächsten Enttappsegments ihres Beherrschers.
Stelle Nachforschungen an. (Erzeuge einen Hinweis-Spielstein. Er ist ein Artefakt mit „{2}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Ziehe eine Karte.")

foreignData.name: Exigir respuestas
foreignData.text:
Gira la criatura objetivo. No se endereza durante el próximo paso de enderezar de su controlador.
Investiga. (Crea una ficha de Pista. Es un artefacto con "{2}, sacrificar este artefacto: Roba una carta".)

foreignData.name: Exhortation inquisitoire
foreignData.text:
Engagez une créature ciblée. Elle ne se dégage pas pendant la prochaine étape de dégagement de son contrôleur.
Enquêtez. (Créez un jeton Indice. C'est un artefact avec « {2}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Piochez une carte. »)

foreignData.name: Esigere le Risposte
foreignData.text:
TAPpa una creatura bersaglio. Quella creatura non STAPpa durante il prossimo STAP del suo controllore.
Indaga. (Crea una pedina Indizio. È un artefatto con "{2}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Pesca una carta".)

foreignData.name: 回答の強要
foreignData.text:
クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それをタップする。それは次のそれのコントローラーのアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。
調査を行う。（手掛かり・トークン１つを生成する。それは、「{2},このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：カード１枚を引く。」を持つアーティファクトである。）

foreignData.name: 强求解答
foreignData.text:
横置目标生物。它于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。
探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）

mainBoard.name: Press for Answers
mainBoard.originalText:
Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

rulings.text: If you sacrifice a Clue for another card's cost or effect, such as that of Angelic Purge or Tamiyo's Journal, you can't also pay {2} and sacrifice it to draw a card.
The token is named Clue Token and has the artifact subtype Clue. Clue isn't a creature type.
The tokens are normal artifacts. For example, they can be sacrificed to cast Angelic Purge or targeted by Root Out.
You can't cast a spell without choosing legal targets. If all of those targets become illegal, the spell doesn't resolve and you won't investigate.

mainBoard.text:
Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

mainBoard.flavorText: "Just a collage of images: cryptoliths, the sea, a tangle of shipwrecks."

foreignData.flavorText: „Nur eine Collage aus Bildern: Kryptolithen, die See, ein Haufen Schiffswracks."
foreignData.name: Jaces prüfender Blick

mainBoard.name: Jace's Scrutiny
mainBoard.originalText:
Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
Investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

rulings.text: If you sacrifice a Clue for another card's cost or effect, such as that of Angelic Purge or Tamiyo's Journal, you can't also pay {2} and sacrifice it to draw a card.
The token is named Clue Token and has the artifact subtype Clue. Clue isn't a creature type.
The tokens are normal artifacts. For example, they can be sacrificed to cast Angelic Purge or targeted by Root Out.
You can't cast a spell without choosing legal targets. If all of those targets become illegal, the spell doesn't resolve and you won't investigate.

foreignData.text:
结附于由你操控的神器
在你的维持开始时，派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为所结附的神器之复制品。然后如果你操控八个或更多彼此同名的神器，你便赢得这盘游戏。

mainBoard.name: Mechanized Production
mainBoard.originalText:
Enchant artifact you control
At the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that's a copy of enchanted artifact. Then if you control eight or more artifacts with the same name as one another, you win the game.

rulings.text: All eight of the permanents sharing a name must be artifacts. If you control only seven artifacts with the same name and a nonartifact permanent with that same name, you won't win the game.

Any abilities that trigger on the token being created won't resolve until after Mechanized Production's triggered ability has finished resolving entirely and performed its check for eight artifacts with the same name.

Any enters-the-battlefield abilities of the copied artifact trigger when the artifact token enters the battlefield. The artifact token also has any "this enters the battlefield with" or "as this enters the battlefield" abilities that the copied artifact has.

If Mechanized Production and the enchanted artifact leave the battlefield simultaneously in response to the triggered ability, then the effect creates a token that's a copy of the artifact as it last existed on the battlefield.
If the copied artifact has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be zero.
If the copied artifact is a token, the token that's created copies the original characteristics of that token as stated by the effect that created it.
If the copied artifact is copying something else (for example, if the copied artifact is a Sculpting Steel), then the token enters the battlefield as whatever that artifact copied.

If the enchanted artifact leaves the battlefield in response to Mechanized Production's triggered ability but Mechanized Production does not, Mechanized Production is put into its owner's graveyard as a state-based action with no enchanted artifact. The triggered ability creates no token, but you can still win the game if you control enough artifacts with the same name.

If you control eight or more artifacts that share a name while you control Mechanized Production, you won't win the game yet. You'll win the game while resolving its triggered ability during your upkeep.

The eight artifacts with the same name don't have to have the same name as the enchanted artifact. For example, you win the game if you control eight Thopter artifact creature tokens as Mechanized Production's ability resolves, even if Mechanized Production isn't attached to a Thopter.

The token copies exactly what was printed on the original artifact and nothing else (unless that artifact is copying something else or is a token; see below). It doesn't copy whether that artifact is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras attached to it, or any non-copy effects that have changed its types, color, or so on.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant artifact you control
At the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that's a copy of enchanted artifact. Then if you control eight or more artifacts with the same name as one another, you win the game.

foreignData.name: Informatorische Befragung
foreignData.text:
Verzaubert eine Kreatur oder einen Planeswalker
Wenn die Informatorische Befragung ins Spiel kommt, tappe die verzauberte bleibende Karte und stelle Nachforschungen an. (Erzeuge einen Hinweis-Spielstein. Er ist ein Artefakt mit „{2}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Ziehe eine Karte.")
Die verzauberte bleibende Karte enttappt nicht während des Enttappsegments ihres Beherrschers, und ihre aktivierten Fähigkeiten können nicht aktiviert werden.

foreignData.name: Someter a interrogatorio
foreignData.text:
Encantar criatura o planeswalker.
Cuando Someter a interrogatorio entre al campo de batalla, gira el permanente encantado e investiga. (Crea una ficha de Pista. Es un artefacto con "{2}, sacrificar este artefacto: Roba una carta".)
El permanente encantado no se endereza durante el paso de enderezar de su controlador y no pueden activarse sus habilidades activadas.

foreignData.name: Interrogatoire
foreignData.text:
Enchanter : créature ou planeswalker
Quand l'Interrogatoire arrive sur le champ de bataille, engagez le permanent enchanté et enquêtez. (Créez un jeton Indice. C'est un artefact avec « {2}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Piochez une carte. »)
Le permanent enchanté ne se dégage pas pendant l'étape de dégagement de son contrôleur et ses capacités activées ne peuvent pas être activées.

foreignData.name: Sottoporre a Interrogatorio
foreignData.text:
Incanta creatura o planeswalker
Quando Sottoporre a Interrogatorio entra nel campo di battaglia, TAPpa il permanente incantato e indaga. (Crea una pedina Indizio. È un artefatto con "{2}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Pesca una carta".)
Il permanente incantato non STAPpa durante lo STAP del suo controllore e le sue abilità attivate non possono essere attivate.

foreignData.name: 尋問の引き留め
foreignData.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャーやプレインズウォーカー）
尋問の引き留めが戦場に出たとき、エンチャントしているパーマネントをタップし、調査を行う。（手掛かり・トークン１つを生成する。（それは、「{2},このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：カード１枚を引く。」を持つアーティファクトである。）
エンチャントしているパーマネントはコントローラーのアンタップ・ステップにアンタップせず、それの起動型能力は起動できない。
foreignData.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreignData.name: 扣押讯问
foreignData.text:
结附于生物或鹏洛客
当扣押讯问进战场时，横置所结附的永久物并探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。）
所结附的永久物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置，且其起动式异能都不能起动。

mainBoard.name: Hold for Questioning
mainBoard.originalText:
Enchant creature or planeswalker
When Hold for Questioning enters the battlefield, tap enchanted permanent and investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step and its activated abilities can't be activated.

rulings.text: Activated abilities contain a colon. They're generally written "[Cost]: [Effect]." Some keywords are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder text.
Loyalty abilities are a type of activated ability, so Hold for Questioning will prevent an enchanted planeswalker's loyalty abilities being activated.
Static and triggered abilities are unaffected by Hold for Questioning.
The permanent can be untapped by other spells and abilities.
You can enchant a permanent that is already tapped with Hold for Questioning. If you do, it doesn't become tapped again, but you will still investigate.

mainBoard.text:

Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step and its activated abilities can't be activated.
